title: How to crack UGC NET (environmental science) - Quora

response.answer_text: I have cleared JRF thrice in general category with good marks. It is totally possible. Infact one of the easy exams. It doenst have much to do with your caliber of cramming but most with time managemnet and division of subjects. Just do ten years well. Improve stats, enenrgy, air, water and ecology. Buy R gupta’s ten year. Practice it all. Do not forget to build your efficiencey in paper one as well. Thanks

hard work is the best way to get any thing u want but if u want crack ugc net so firstly make your time table for study and buy some books for prepering ugc net and you can get some online classes on you tube and if you want to get some deeply knowlege on your subject related topics so you can saerch on wikipidiya and an other websaties also give some stuff related your subject and you should make some notes becouse it’s help you becoz at the exam time. it will hlep you so i hope these all information will hlep you and any other you can ask and good luck .
